                                               SECTION A

Complete one of the following tasks. Write 250 to 400 words.

1.    Cultural diversity

      You recently read a blog in which the writer claimed that all sectors of the population of a country
      should celebrate the same festivals. Write a blog entry in response stating your opinion on the matter.


2.    Customs and traditions

      Your school hosted a Culture Day in which students from different cultures celebrated their
      customs, cultural practices and/or traditions. Write a review of the event to be published in your
      school newspaper.


3.    Health

      Many teenagers in your community feel insecure about the way they look. Write an article
      to be published in a youth magazine in which you outline the reasons why teenagers have those
      insecurities and suggest solutions.


4.    Leisure

      A friend of yours has emailed you a link to an interview with a sports figure who argued that sports
      should not be played for leisure. Write an email to your friend in which you express your views on
      the subject.


5.    Science and technology

      You are participating in a class debate on the motion: “Science experiments should not involve the
      use of animals”. Write the text of your opening speech either agreeing or disagreeing with
      this motion.

                                               SECTION B

6.    “The news isn’t there to tell you what happened. It’s there to tell you what it wants you to hear or
      what it thinks you want to hear.”
